Question: In 1968, this person was named "Man of the Year" by Harvard University's performance group, the Hasty Pudding Theatricals.
Hints: During this time this person started acting in television.
In 2005 at age 80, this person was profiled alongside Robert Redford as part of the Sundance Channel's TV series Iconoclasts.
This person announced that he would entirely retire from acting on May 25, 2007.
